Female Musk Sheep Sir. J. Richardson 
Musk Sheep Coll. Sur 
Alderny Cow. 
Distance of the sternal angle of the crest of 
one ilium to that of the other 13.0in 13.5in 13.<s>7<\s> 8.3

the dorsal angle of the same ilium or

Sterno-dorsal diameter of the  iliac shaft 
at its narrowest place 1.5 1.6 1.6 2.0

Transverse distance from the apex of 
one lateral conical process near the 
dorsal angle of the ischium to the 
apex <s>tuberosity?<\s>of the other (Maximum) 8.1 7.8 8.0 11.0 
Transverse distance between the dorsal 
or spinous angles <s>edge<\s> of the ischium, being
